metadata.name: SCENE ZERO
metadata.description:
Created By: JASON NAYLOR & MANCEL LINDSEY

A living mural originally painted in Brooklyn, NY... the place where it all began.

In early 2021, Jason created a KINDNESS mural in partnership with KINDNESS.ORG. That mural soon led to a meeting with Mancel, who also has very close ties to KINDNESS.ORG. With roots in the creative industry and a shared passion for KINDNESS, they found synergy in the desire to bring these vibes into the NFT space. Mancel brought the mural to life with motion and while street art is temporary, the blockchain is forever. KINDNESS lives on...
